sitrep 0.1.0
  • Reference

Stratifies z-scores by variables in the survey data

stratify_zscores.Rd

Stratifies z-scores by variables in the survey data

stratify_zscores(survey_data, by, ...)

Arguments

survey_data

a data.frame with the survey data
by

a column by which you want to stratify the data
...

columns having zscore indicators

Examples

# A crude example, but it works
stratify_zscores(mtcars, by = "gear", am, vs)
#> Warning: `cols` is now required.
#> Please use `cols = c(ci)`
#> Warning: `cols` is now required.
#> Please use `cols = c(ci)`
#> # A tibble: 8 x 7
#>   stratum     n flagged   rel  lower upper  gear
#>   <chr>   <int>   <dbl> <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 am         32      13 0.406 0.255  0.577    NA
#> 2 vs         32      14 0.438 0.282  0.607    NA
#> 3 am         15       0 0     0      0.204     3
#> 4 am         12       8 0.667 0.391  0.862     4
#> 5 am          5       5 1     0.566  1         5
#> 6 vs         15       3 0.2   0.0705 0.452     3
#> 7 vs         12      10 0.833 0.552  0.953     4
#> 8 vs          5       1 0.2   0.0362 0.624     5
